title: Why are my emails being blocked to my wife's Rogers email
content: My emails (from bthomson@web.ca) to my wife (hstevens@rogers.com) are being blocked on her computer running Thunderbird. It happens whether I send them from Thunderbird myself or from Maildroid on my phone or tablet. All my other many many emails are getting through but not mine to her. I can't find a block instruction in her (or my) Thunderbird software which does this.
creator: bthomson
